definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Mordo takes his power and says there's too many sorcerers in the world.
sentences.chinese: 莫度夺走了潘伯恩的法力，说世界上的魔法师太多了。

sentences.english: Grandpa: To catch fish, you need the right magic.
sentences.chinese: 要钓到鱼，你得有正确的魔法。

sentences.english: Amount of summoned Water Elementals increases by 50%.
sentences.chinese: 所有水元素召唤魔法招出的元素数量增加50%。

sentences.english: First frost meant magic snowball time.
sentences.chinese: 早霜意味着是播种魔法雪球的时候。

sentences.english: At three-fifteen the following afternoon, Persky worked his wizardry again.
sentences.chinese: 第二天下午三点十五分，帕斯基再次施展魔法。

sentences.english: Perhaps his coffee possesses some sort of magic which charms people?
sentences.chinese: 该不会是他的咖啡，有著会令人著迷的魔法吧？

sentences.english: Discover the magical world of Mini Ninjas, and play one of the 3 ninja games.
sentences.chinese: 迷你忍者发现了魔法世界，发挥忍者的3场比赛之一。

sentences.english: Artificers treat mastery of magic like a technical skill.
sentences.chinese: 机关术士将魔法的掌握视为一种技术性的能力。

sentences.english: Mage Armor no longer reduces the duration of beneficial magic buffs .
sentences.chinese: 法师护甲不再降低任何有益魔法的持续时间。

sentences.english: The magic of first-house land wizards is necessary to remove it.
sentences.chinese: 必须使用第一护院大地巫师的魔法方能清除。

sentences.english: Cripple's armor and magic penetration lowered to 10 from 25.
sentences.chinese: 残废的护甲与魔法穿透效果从25减少到10。

sentences.english: "The big thing here is that there is nothing magic about cyberspace," Schneier says.
sentences.chinese: 这儿的大事是网络空间没有什么魔法。

sentences.english: Slowing abilities and spells will no longer decrease the speed of a player when traveling by Gryphon.
sentences.chinese: 乘坐狮鹫时，减速魔法和效果不再会降低玩家的速度。

sentences.english: Funny way to get to a wizards' school, the train. Magic carpets all got punctures, have they?
sentences.chinese: 坐火车去魔法学院真有意思，难道飞毯都穿洞了吗？

sentences.english: I cannae understand a word, even wit' tha magic o' Thor.
sentences.chinese: 就算使上托尔的魔法，俺也一个字都不懂。

sentences.english: Is an enchanter necessary to give magic properties to an item?
sentences.chinese: 幻术师是否可以给物品添加魔法属性？

definition: occult force/the power of a God or spirit
